Stealth Fintech Startup | Budapest, Hungary | Full-Time | ONSITE We are a stealth fintech startup. Our teams are located in Boston, MA, USA and Budapest, Hungary. Our founder has three successful startups to date, one publicly traded and worth around $1B.

We are currently recruiting for the following roles in Budapest:

- Senior Backend Engineer | Java

- Senior Frontend Engineer | JavaScript + React

- Quantitative Analyst

If you are interested react out at amilassin@gmail.com
